title: KitchedAid 5 (more then 20 color variants, capacity 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in single batch, 59 touch points planetary mixing, includes: Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, Pouring Shield)
descriptions:
### KitchedAid 5 Stand Mixer - The Ultimate Kitchen Companion

#### Overview
Discover the incredible versatility and power of the KitchedAid 5, a high-performance stand mixer that offers more than 20 color variants to fit any kitchen aesthetic. This durable and stylish mixer is perfect for bakers, cooks, and food enthusiasts who demand quality and convenience in their kitchen tasks.

#### Key Features
- **Capacity & Mixing Efficiency**: Mix up to 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaf breads in one batch. The planetary mixing action ensures even distribution of ingredients with 59 touch points, providing superior mixing results.
- **Durable Construction**: Constructed from metal, this mixer is built to last, with a 5-quart stainless steel bowl that is both comfortable to handle and dishwasher safe.
- **Tilt-Head Design**: The tilt-head design allows for easy bowl removal, making cleaning a breeze.
- **Powerful Motor & Speeds**: With 10 speed settings, this mixer can handle everything from delicate doughs to tough batters with ease.
- **Comprehensive Inclusions**: The KitchedAid 5 comes equipped with essential accessories including a 5-quart stainless steel bowl, coated flat beater, coated dough hook, 6-wire whip, and a pouring shield. Optional attachments, including over 10 hub-powered attachments (sold separately), are available to expand your mixing capabilities.
- **Colorful Variety**: Choose from more than 20 color variants to match your kitchen decor.

#### Included Accessories
- 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl
- Coated Flat Beater
- Coated Dough Hook
- 6-Wire Whip
- Pouring Shield

#### Specifications
- **Colors**: More than 20 color variants
- **Capacity**: 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaf breads
- **Mixing**: 59 touch points planetary mixing
- **Bowl**: Size - 5 Quarts, Material - Stainless Steel, Handle - Comfortable, Dishwasher Safe - Yes
- **Design**: Tilt-head
- **Speeds**: 10
- **Optional Attachments**: More than 10 hub-powered attachments (sold separately)

#### Model: KSM150PS

Elevate your baking and cooking experience with the KitchedAid 5. Order today and transform your kitchen into a culinary masterpiece!
